About Us

Only supports primary school programs by providing tools that strengthen the foundations of learning and make studying easier. It also improves communication between schools and families through direct access to official communications.


Every year, 1% of the company’s revenue is allocated to the purchase of tablets for schools in disadvantaged areas, also providing free access to the platform.

Services

Ministerial Programs

In collaboration with the Ministry of Education, the app provides curriculum-aligned learning materials, including interactive lessons and practice activities, to support independent study and book-based learning.

Library

Integrated search for reading and purchasing books to support students’ learning, based on the school curriculum.

LIS

A visual–gestural LIS (Italian Sign Language) channel designed to support students with hearing impairments.
